title: China's investment in clean energy abroad exceeds $100bn since 2023 – report | Energy Central
text: [click for more info](/subs-products) News Link China's investment in clean energy abroad exceeds $100bn since 2023 – report China is the leading producer and exporter of various energy products including solar modules, lithium batteries and electric vehicles (EVs). The report said that the country's deployment, export capabilities, innovation, investment, manufacturing, and research and development for green technologies are “world leading by an astonishing margin”. The country's dominance in cleantech supply ...
